name: Temerarious
description:
IMPORTANT:  Windows Executable has a bug I can't fix. Removing the option to download this game for now.

Temerarious: An adjective meaning rashly or presumptuously daring

The Vivalockes are heretics who use their own Life Force to power their attacks.  A risky practice that has huge payoffs in combat. 

Join the Vivalocke Juniper Breaker as she takes off an adventure to save her brother (and give him a piece of her mind while she's at it!)

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Move around
  • Enter - Action
  • Esc - Menu
  • Shift - Hold while moving to dash
